Articles.Content: Martian Lake City

Well, seeing as I want to get in on this, I cast **Armageddon**:

![armageddon-40687.jpg](https://www.cardkingdom.com/images/magic-the-gathering/from-the-vault-annihilation/armageddon-40687.jpg)

Now that there are no more lands in play, I play a **Mountain**:

![mountain-a-23601.jpg](https://www.cardkingdom.com/images/magic-the-gathering/3rd-edition/mountain-a-23601.jpg)

And then I tap it so that I can cast **Brass Man** to defend my new hill:

![Image.ashx?multiverseid=903&type=card](https://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=903&type=card)

Mord Sith dispel any magic.

![legend_of_the_seeker_sisters_dark_mord_s](https://fortresstakes.files.wordpress.com/2010/08/legend_of_the_seeker_sisters_dark_mord_sith_rahl.jpg)

Lord Rahl's Hill.

The mountain was held together with magic, it collapses on Lord Rahl.

Lord Rahl's under mountain tomb.

Lord Rahl's in-series son, an advanced psychocrator, Nicholas Rahl, is living in the cave between these rocks.

He takes under control everyone around.

(See him on the link below, as his photo is too horrible, and the forum software rejects it.)

[https://sot.fandom.com/wiki/Nicholas_Rahl](https://sot.fandom.com/wiki/Nicholas_Rahl)

Well, seeing as @kerbiloid originally mentioned Sith, there is only 1 child capable enough of claiming and defending said hill.

![Untitled-1-2.jpg](https://www.boredpanda.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Untitled-1-2.jpg)

Heck, even Yoda was afraid of this kid.  Afraid enough to deny him training under Qui-Gon, and afraid enough to eventually - but rather reluctantly - allow him to be trained by Obi-Wan.  And even Obi-Wan mentioned "The boy is dangerous.  They all sense it; why can't you?"

Kip Durran from  the Novels was pretty terrifying

[https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Kyp_Durron#:~:text=Kyp Durron was a Human,Imperial rampage in 11 ABY.](https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Kyp_Durron#:~:text=Kyp%20Durron%20was%20a%20Human,Imperial%20rampage%20in%2011%20ABY.)

Kahlan Amnell (The Mother Confessor) possesses both of them.

Btw, Nicholas Rahl is her unwanted son, and thus a Confessor, so he has two more brainwashed biobots.

While everybody is distracted by fantasy fiction, my rubble alliance sieze the hill.

New Replublic hill.

The public is rioting against the plublic.
Porky Pig Hill.
Porky Pig Old Oil Rig

*Oil?* 

did you say...

*Oil?!*

HERE WE COME!!!

![I made some seamless salute gifs :3 : r/Helldivers](https://i.redd.it/w4kqnen05vkc1.gif)

my hill :3

Come and listen to my story about a man named Jed  

A poor mountaineer, barely kept his family fed,  

And then one day he was shootin at some food,  

And up through the ground come a bubblin crude.  

Oil that is, black gold, Texas tea.  

Well the first thing you know ol Jed's a millionaire,  

The kinfolk said "Jed move away from there"  

Said "Californy is the place you ought to be"  

So they loaded up the truck and they moved to Beverly  

Hills, that is. Swimmin pools, movie stars.  

Old Jed bought a mansion, lordy it was swank  

Next door neighbor's the president of the bank.  

Lotta folks complaining but the banker found no fault  

'Cause all Jed's millions, was a-sitting in the vault!  

Redemption funds. Stocks and bonds.  

Well now it's time to say good bye to Jed and all his kin.  

And they would like to thank you folks fer kindly droppin in.  

You're all invited back next week to this locality  

To have a heapin helpin of their hospitality  

Hillbilly that is. Set a spell, Take your shoes off.  

Y'all come back now, y'hear?

**Beverly Hill**
